summary: Adds a complete Elven weapon set.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85676-77-1501286687.png[/img][/center]

Adds a complete Elven weapon set in three variants. One normal, one enchanted, and one that does double damage. The normal ones can be crafted at any forge, the enchanted ones are hidden in some interior cells, the double damage ones require a special anvil hidden in one location and require an enchanted version to craft or a filled black soul gem for the items that don't have an enchanted version(bow/crossbow). There is one chest with all normal and enchanted versions hidden as well.(all weapons are in interior cells).

The normal and enchanted versions can also be found in random on 4 different "Adventurers" that cross Skyrim. 2 of the adventurers will attack on sight, and 2 will help you if you get in a fight and they are nearby. I made them both good and bad and set thier patrol to start and end at the same location on the off chance you might randomly come across them fighting amongst themselves. They level with the player and have slightly better than Daedric weapons or one of them with a powerful enchantment so at low levels the bad ones could prove rather difficult. At level one I suggest running and ignoring the brown stinky mess in your pants.

Arrows and bolts come in normal versions and fire, ice, or shock explosive variants. The arrows use the same setup as Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows, and both arrows and bolts have less gravity and more speed. The less gravity gives less arc in aiming, and the speed makes them fly faster.

The two staffs come with their own enchantment, one is the three basic "flames" spells of which I only remember the flames ones name combined into one so it does 8 points of fire, 8 of ice, and 8 of shock per second. The other is the double damage variant and does 48 points per second of death. I used my Death Flames Spell mod to make it as in XEdit copy over and make the enchantment instead of a spell. To get the Death Flames variation you must use the special anvil and have a normal version to sacrifce. The other weapons enchantments are basicaly a modified version of Harkons Sword enchantment(same damage).

Please do not give spoilers to the locations of the items scattered throughout the game in the comments without a spoiler tag. Please post screenshots. Video reviewers please equip some of them rather than just in the menue theres a cool animated detail not seen in screenshots.

Skyrim SE version: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11206] Elvish Weapons [/url]

Mod Authors:

This is a mod resource. Feel free to use in your mod, just give proper credits. Letting me know you used it is apreciated.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Versions and update info:[/size][/color][/b]

V1.0 Initial release

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Compatibility and required files:[/size][/color][/b]

Requires Dawnguard.
May be incompatible with anything that changes the same cells.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Install:[/size][/color][/b]

Use NMM.

Manual for individual files:
1. Unzip/unrar to any location.
2. Copy the extracted contents into your Data folder.
3. Add the esp to your load order.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Mod Use Permission: [/size][/color][/b]

Free to use in your mod.
Credits must be given.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Credits: [/size][/color][/b]

Bethesda.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]My other mods....[/size][/color][/b]

[spoiler]
